snippet: The state agreed on Friday to drop the criminal prosecution of a former state treasurer, Tim Cahill, on corruption charges related to his unsuccessful campaign for governor in 2010.
abstract: Massachusetts agrees to drop criminal prosecution of Tim Cahill, former state treasurer, on corruption charges related to his unsuccessful campaign for governor in 2010; Cahill will instead pay $100,000 civil fine.
lead_paragraph: The state agreed on Friday to drop the criminal prosecution of a former state treasurer, Tim Cahill, on corruption charges related to his unsuccessful campaign for governor in 2010.

headline.main: Massachusetts: Case Against Ex-Treasurer Is Dropped
headline.print_headline: Massachusetts: Case Against Ex-Treasurer Is Dropped
